log.input:
Please modify the following program based on this instruction:
change the ball's color to blue

Current program:
from vpython import *

h = 3
v0 = 5
b = 0.1
g = 9.81
t = 0
dt = 0.01

scene.center = vector(0, -h, 0)
floor = box(pos=vector(0, -h, 0), size=vector(10, 0.1, 10), color=color.green)
ball = sphere(pos=vector(0, 0, 0), radius=0.5, color=color.red, make_trail=True)
ball.velocity = vector(v0, 0, 0)

while t < 3:
    rate(100)
    F = -b*ball.velocity
    ball.velocity.x = v0
    ball.velocity.y = ball.velocity.y + (g + F.y)*dt
    ball.pos.x = ball.pos.x + ball.velocity.x*dt
    ball.pos.y = ball.pos.y + ball.velocity.y*dt

    if ball.pos.y <= -h:
        ball.velocity.y = -ball.velocity.y
        ball.pos.y = -h

    t += dt

log.input:
Please modify the following VPython program based on this instruction:
            change the ball's color to blue
      
            Current program:
            from vpython import *

# Screen Settings
scene.width = 800
scene.height = 600

# Parameter Settings
h = 10 # initial height
v0 = 5 # initial velocity
g = 9.81 # acceleration due to gravity
b = 0.1 # air resistance coefficient

# Objects
floor = box(pos=vector(0, -h, 0), size=vector(20, 0.1, 10), color=color.green)
ball = sphere(pos=vector(0, h, 0), radius=0.5, color=color.red, make_trail=True)

# Initial Conditions
ball.v = vector(v0, 0, 0)
t = 0
dt = 0.01

# Simulation Loop
while t < 3:
    rate(100)
    t += dt
    
    ball.a = vector(0, -g, 0) - b * ball.v
    ball.v += ball.a * dt
    ball.pos += ball.v * dt

    if ball.pos.y <= floor.pos.y + floor.size.y / 2:
        ball.v.y = -ball.v.y

    if ball.pos.y <= floor.pos.y + floor.size.y / 2 + ball.radius:
        ball.pos.y = floor.pos.y + floor.size.y / 2 + ball.radius
        ball.v.y = 0
      
            Important: Ensure the changes are precisely implemented in the code.
log.output:
from vpython import *

# Screen Settings
scene.width = 800
scene.height = 600

# Parameter Settings
h = 10 # initial height
v0 = 5 # initial velocity
g = 9.81 # acceleration due to gravity
b = 0.1 # air resistance coefficient

# Objects
floor = box(pos=vector(0, -h, 0), size=vector(20, 0.1, 10), color=color.green)
ball = sphere(pos=vector(0, h, 0), radius=0.5, color=color.blue, make_trail=True)  # Changed color to blue

# Initial Conditions
ball.v = vector(v0, 0, 0)
t = 0
dt = 0.01

# Simulation Loop
while t < 3:
    rate(100)
    t += dt
    
    ball.a = vector(0, -g, 0) - b * ball.v
    ball.v += ball.a * dt
    ball.pos += ball.v * dt

    if ball.pos.y <= floor.pos.y + floor.size.y / 2:
        ball.v.y = -ball.v.y

    if ball.pos.y <= floor.pos.y + floor.size.y / 2 + ball.radius:
        ball.pos.y = floor.pos.y + floor.size.y / 2 + ball.radius
        ball.v.y = 0
